name: David Graber
text: Great customer service and reliable, lighting fast internet- what more could you want? I also like that they use dgtek rather than those NBN dinosaurs

name: Richard Mort
text: Great service, works perfectly, stremaing in 4k

name: Josh Zayon
text: Recently connected and found it a seamless transition. The speed is amazing especially coming from an ADSL connection!

name: Tony Coe
text: Fantastic experience with both customer service and the install techs who went above & beyond. Performance has been rock solid with symmetrical speeds. If you're in their coverages zone, it's a far superior solution than NBN can be offer.

name: J L
text: A level of service rarely seen these days. Fantastic communication. Incredible product. Insanely good speeds. If you're in their network area, ditch the NBN and go with them!

name: Kadin Williams
text: Installation was quick & easy, they got us setup in no time. Very happy with the service

name: Paul Walden
text: Awesome service! Very careful and thorough installation, and the speeds are marvellous! Highly recommended!

name: Josh Zayon
text:
Just connected yesterday the installers were efficient and clean, everything was installed where i requested it. The connection is better than expected. Coming from an ADSL connection the speed is incredible! Now I can enjoy 4K streaming without any buffering!
To anyone considering connecting to this service I would highly recommend

name: Sym Kohn
text: I've had Pineapple for about 9 months and the service has been excellent. I've only ever had to call once, and the issue was handled quickly, efficiently, and politely (and satisfactorily, as well). Speeds have been uniformly as promised and availability has been 99.9999%. Recommended!

name: Simon Edwards
text: Took a punt and gave their fibre internet a go. Speeds have been rock solid, as advertised, with no dips in the evenings like others have. Excellent internet. The installers did a fantastic job getting us all up and running too, you’d never know they’d been here. Highly recommended.

name: Tim Wells
text: Very happy with the connection and service from pineapple net. Carlos took care of the setup and he is terrific. Thanks

name: A STOCK
text: Have recently crossed over from TPG to Pineapple NET and am extremely happy with the coverage and assistance provided by Pineapple NET. More value for my dollar! But best of all, the internet connection speed and no more buffering has been a winner for me

name: Mark Brickles
text: Fantastic ISP. Great rates. Great personalised service. Very responsive. Customer centric culture

name: Gary Buck
text: Love pineapple net ISP. Good price and super fast. . Very happy customer

name: Daniel Lennox
text: Amazing service! Less than 24 hours after I called I was up and running with super fast fibre!
